/usr/bin/clang++ -g -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.1.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=12.7 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/OpenGL.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o OpenGL  -Wl,-rpath,/Users/bearkun/Desktop/codes/Cpp/OpenGL/build/glad src/libutils.a glad/libglad.dylib glfw/src/libglfw3.a -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation
